name: AEROCLUB DE VITORIA HERACLIO ALFARO
about: Aeroclub de Vitoria Heraclio Alfaro, located at Vitoria/Foronda Airport, is a premier flying school dedicated to providing comprehensive aviation training. Our private pilot program includes 100 hours of theoretical teaching and 45 hours of flight practice, covering essential topics such as meteorology and aircraft operations. Approved by the Spanish Aviation Safety Agency (AESA), we offer certifications for Private Aircraft Pilot (PPL), Touring Motor Glider (TMG), and night flight qualifications. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure a safe and effective learning environment. We are open every day from 06:00 AM to 11:00 PM, ready to help you achieve your aviation goals. Contact us for more information on our courses and activities designed to take you to the sky.
